name: Mở/khóa cửa
Get Temp and humid
func:
var p = msg.payload
msg.payload = []

const arr = [p.temp,p.humid]
flow.set("temp", arr[0])
flow.set("humid", arr[1])

msg.payload.push(arr[0])
msg.payload.push(arr[1]) 

return msg;
